SEARCH
Package driver

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
driver.Driver
public class Driver extends Object
Processes movie catalog by partitioning valid records into genre-based files, serializing them into binary files, and deserializing for navigation. Provides an interactive interface to display movie records.
Since:
2024-03-27

    • do_part1

      public static String do_part1(String manifest1FilePath)
      Partitions movie records in all the input files into CSV files, each storing valid movie records from the same genre separates movie records with errors into separate file produces manifest2 file and 17 CSV files containing valid movie records + error file
      Parameters:
      manifest1FilePath -
      Returns:
      manifest2FileName

    • createManifestFile

      public static void createManifestFile(String manifestFilePath, int manifestNumber)

    • partiateFile

      public static Movie[] partiateFile(String filePath)
      Processes a file containing movie records and partitions it into an array of Movie objects. Invalid records are written to a separate file "bad_movie_records.txt".
      Parameters:
      filePath -
      Returns:
      array of valid movie objects. Returns null if the file was not found.

    • parseLine

      public static String[] parseLine(String line) throws ExcessFieldsException, MissingFieldsException
      parses the line into fields and validates the number of fields
      Parameters:
      line -
      Returns:
      array of String movie fields
      Throws:
      ExcessFieldsException
      MissingFieldsException

    • createMovieRecord

      public static Movie createMovieRecord(String line) throws SyntaxException, SemanticException
      partiates string into movie record fields and validates syntax and semantic of it, then creates a Movie object from them.
      Parameters:
      movieRecordFields - - String array of all movie record fields
      Returns:
      valid movie object
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - - all types of syntax errors
      SemanticException - - all types of semantic errors

    • do_part2

      public static String do_part2(String manifest2FilePath)
      for all genre files loads a Movie array with records from the file, and then serializes the resulting array into a binary file produces manifest3 file and 17 binary files containing serialized movie arrays
      Parameters:
      manifest2FilePath -
      Returns:
      manifest3FileName

    • partiateCSVFile

      public static Movie[] partiateCSVFile(String filePath)
      Processes a CSV file containing VALID movie records and partitions it into an array of Movie objects.
      Parameters:
      filePath -
      Returns:
      array of valid movie objects. Returns null if the file was not found or empty

    • serialize

      public static void serialize(Movie[] movies, String genre)
      serializes the array of movie objects into a binary file named genre.ser
      Parameters:
      movies -

    • do_part3

      public static Movie[][] do_part3(String manifest3FilePath)
      Deserializes the array of Movie objects from binary files Each binary file contains a serialized array of Movie objects for a genre.
      Parameters:
      manifest3FilePath - Path to the manifest file containing the list of binary files.
      Returns:
      2D array of Movie objects,row represents a genre.

    • displayAllMovies

      public static void displayAllMovies(Movie[][] all_movies)
      Displays all movies from the 2D array of Movie objects.
      Parameters:
      all_movies - The 2D array of Movie objects to display.

    • getGenre

      public static String getGenre(int index)
      Gets the genre name based on index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the genre in the genres array.
      Returns:
      The name of the genre.

    • navigateMovies

      public static void navigateMovies(Movie[][] all_movies)
      dispaly main menu and select a movie to navigate.
      Parameters:
      all_movies - The 2D array of Movie objects where each row represents a genre.

    • selectGenre

      public static void selectGenre(Movie[][] all_movies)
      select a movie genre to navigate.
      Parameters:
      all_movies - The 2D array of Movie objects where each row represents a genre.
